price: ߞߏ߬ߣߌ߲߬ ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫ ߸ ߟߐ߬ߓߊ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߐ߲߬ߞߐ߲߬ߒ߬ߡߊ߬ ߕߎߡߊ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߟߐ߬ߓߊ ߟߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߜߍ߬ߟߍ߲߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߞߊ߫ ߞߎߣߊ߫
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bali al-sāʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-sāʿatu adhā wa-amarru
